ARABIC: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَفْصِلُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day of Rising your Lord will decide between them regarding everything about which they differed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely your Lord will decide between them about what they were at variance, on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely your Lord will judge among them on the Day of Resurrection concerning the matters about which the Children of Israel used to differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord will issue His decree about their (believers and disbeliever's) differences on the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning the matters in which they used to differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection, concerning that wherein they used to differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely your Lord will judge between them on the day of resurrection concerning that wherein they differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thy Lord will distinguish between them on the Resurrection Day, touching that whereon they were at variance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that wherein they used to differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that wherein they used to differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily thy Lord! He shall decide between them on the Day of Judgment concerning that wherein they have been differing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that about which they used to differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment, in the matters wherein they differ (among themselves)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection, concerning that wherein they used to differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On the Day of Resurrection your Lord will distinguish between them that on which they varied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection regarding everything they had disputed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [32:25] Surely your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that wherein they used to differ, in matters of religion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thy Lord) Muhammad (will judge between them) between the believer and disbeliever; it is also said: between the Children of Israel (on the Day of Resurrection concerning that wherein) in Religion (they used to differ) they used to oppose.
